Question
========
  
A questionnaire on sexuality and promiscuity is completed in each group of the study on "the degree of being sexually informed by parents." If we want to compare mean promiscuity scores between boys and girls and between uninformed and informed adolescents, what analysis technique should we use? 
Answerlist
----------
* Point biserial correlation
* ANOVA
* Two-way ANOVA
* Chi-square test of independence
